title: Samsung reveals Galaxy Tab S8 series pricing, pre-order and sales info for India
content:
Samsung India has finally shared the pricing details for the company’s latest flagship tablet lineup, the Galaxy Tab S8 series. If you’re thinking of getting your hands on one of the new Galaxy tablets, you can pre-order them starting tomorrow or wait until the next month for the first open sale. Samsung Galaxy Tab S8

The post Samsung reveals Galaxy Tab S8 series pricing, pre-order and sales info for India appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Samsung India has finally released the pricing and availability details for the Galaxy Tab S8 series in the region. Read on to learn all about the launch offers and pre-order benefits.
